episodes.title: Within
episodes.plot: New Deputy Director Kersh has Agent John Doggett investigate the missing Mulder case. Doggett's skeptical treatment of Mulder's disappearance puts a thorn in Scully and Skinner's sides.

episodes.title: Without
episodes.plot: Scully leads Skinner and an unhappy Doggett to Arizona to protect child prodigy Gibson Praise from an alien bounty hunter disguised as the missing Mulder.

episodes.title: Patience
episodes.plot: Scully isn't exactly warm to Doggett on their first X-File together in which they investigate a human bat.

episodes.title: Roadrunners
episodes.plot: Doggett is a little dismayed when Scully investigates a murder in a barely inhabited town in Utah without him. When Scully's car breaks down and she finds the town people aren't as sweet as they seem she struggles to find a way out of the demented town.

episodes.title: Invocation
episodes.plot: Doggett and Scully once again butt heads on their latest X-File which involves a boy who has returned after being missing for ten years but still appears to be seven years old, the age he was the day he was abducted.

episodes.title: Redrum
episodes.plot: A man lives the most recent 5 days of his life backwards and finds out that he is the main suspect in the murder of his wife.

episodes.title: Via Negativa
episodes.plot: While Scully tends to her secret, Doggett and Skinner team up to find and somehow stop a cult leader who can kill people in their dreams.

episodes.title: Surekill
episodes.plot: Doggett and Scully investigate two shady brothers who run a rat extermination business, one of whom may be a killer with X-Ray vision.

episodes.title: Salvage
episodes.plot: A man believed to be dead from Gulf War Syndrome comes back to life and slowly turns into metal while taking revenge on those who made him that way.

episodes.title: Badlaa
episodes.plot: A small Indian man on a creaky cart with powers of illusion is believed to have the ability to take over people's bodies and kill them by leaping into their anal cavity. Doggett and Scully try to stop his gruesome killing spree.

episodes.title: The Gift
episodes.plot: Skinner and Doggett investigate a case Mulder was working on before he disappeared involving a family and a monster straight from Native American lore.

episodes.title: Medusa
episodes.plot: Doggett takes to the Boston subways to try to figure out where a deadly agent that is killing citizens is coming from.

episodes.title: Per Manum
episodes.plot: Scully stumbles upon a woman whose abductee experience and symptoms are amazingly similar. The fear now is that both their upcoming births will be to non-human offspring.

episodes.title: This Is Not Happening
episodes.plot: Jeremiah Smith appears out of nowhere and formerly dead abductees are coming back to life, giving Scully and Skinner the idea that Mulder may have a shot at still being alive.

episodes.title: Deadalive
episodes.plot: Three months after Mulder's funeral, another dead alien abductee comes back to life. Skinner exhumes Mulder hoping that he too can be revived. Skinner faces an impossible decision when Krycek offers him a vaccine that can save Mulder.

episodes.title: Three Words
episodes.plot: Mulder requests reassignment to the X-Files but is denied by Kersh. When a man with information about an alien invasion is killed on the White House lawn, Mulder conducts his own investigation to find further evidence of colonization.

episodes.title: Empedocles
episodes.plot: Upon being fired, an office worker murders his employers, believed to be under the influence of pure evil. Agent Reyes believes this evil may be linked to the death of Doggett's son.

episodes.title: Vienen
episodes.plot: Doggett and Mulder unwillingly team up investigating an oil rig where some mysterious murders have happened and the possibility of the Black Oil being involved is a haunting reality.

episodes.title: Alone
episodes.plot: A bizarre reptilian creature captures Doggett and his new Mulder-obsessed partner underground and only an X-Files deposed Mulder can help them.

episodes.title: Essence
episodes.plot: The X-Files team must protect Agent Scully and her unborn child as groups of Super Soldiers try to stop her pregnancy.

episodes.title: Existence
episodes.plot: Agents Mulder, Doggett and Skinner investigate (along with Alex Krycek) the Super Soldier conspiracy, while Scully goes into hiding to have her child.
